bibl.title: The Language of the Papyri.
bibl.note: Versions of most of the chapters were presented at the conference 'Buried Linguistic Treasure: The Potential of Papyri and Related Sources for the Study of Greek and Latin' held at Christ Church, Oxford from 30 June to 2 July 2006. - Pp. v-vi: Tr.V.E. and D.D.O., Preface; - 1-12: Tr.V.E. and D.D.O., Introduction; - 313-334: Bibliography; - 335-362: Index.
bibl.seg: EVANS Trevor V. and Dirk D. OBBINK (Edd.), The Language of the Papyri.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2010, 8°, xxii-362 pp., tabl., figg. ISBN 978-0-19-923708-1. £65.

Versions of most of the chapters were presented at the conference 'Buried Linguistic Treasure: The Potential of Papyri and Related Sources for the Study of Greek and Latin' held at Christ Church, Oxford from 30 June to 2 July 2006. - Pp. v-vi: Tr.V.E. and D.D.O., Preface; - 1-12: Tr.V.E. and D.D.O., Introduction; - 313-334: Bibliography; - 335-362: Index.

C.R. par B. Stenuit, EtCl 78 (2010) pp. 257-258. - Silvia Barbantani, CR N.S., 61 (2011) pp. 282-284. - Amphilochios Papathomas & Aikaterini Koroli, Tyche 28 (2013) pp. 242-245. - Agostino Soldati, PP 66 (2011) fasc. 379, pp. 306-320. - Peter van Minnen, BASP 50 (2013) pp. 339-341. - Naïm Vanthieghem, ChrEg 89 (2014) No. 177, pp. 187-189.
